rpgonline.bullet

Class BasicBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.bullet.BasicBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bullet

    public class BasicBullet
extends java.lang.Object
implements Bullet
    A bullet with a single texture and constant velocity.
    Author:
    Tomas

        xv - The X velocity of the player.
